In this block seminar students present book chapters or research papers on current topics in mathematical and computational neuroscience.
A list of topics will be provided here soon. Students can work in teams of two or alone.
For organizational information (esp. dates of the seminar!), there will be an initial
kick-off meeting on Friday April 19, 2024 at 12:30pm
The presentations will take place in July (probably last week of the lecture period).
